CustomField.description: The actual utilization calculated by talking the number of slots in which a patient was seen divided by the total number of available slots for a given provider at a given VISN in a given date range.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculated by talking the number of slots in which a patient was seen (not including ANY cancelations) after the appointment was scheduled divided by the total number of available slots.
CustomField.label: Actual Utilization
